name: Port Stephens Marina Resort

reviews.title: Great view from hotel balcony
reviews.text: Hotel staff were friendly, room a little tired but still comfortable, view beautiful

reviews.title: Excellent value for money!
reviews.text: The location on a hill above the bay affords great views of the marina and Port Stephens beyond. I found the hotel to be very clean, quiet and comfortable and my room appeared to be recently re-decorated.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a short stroll to the marina and shops while the bus to the Williamstown airport stops right outside. Despite being a bus route, the street is mainly residential and quiet.
reviews.title: Great view from the room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Friendly and helpful staff here. My flight didn't leave until 6:00pm and as the day was very rainy the manager graciouly said I could stay in my room as long as I wanted.
reviews.title: Not what we expected

reviews.text: Just had the more than adequate continental breakfast so I can't vouch for the resaurant but the views are wonderful from its top floor location.
reviews.title: Great view but earplugs necessary

reviews.text: Thank you to the staff of Port Stephens Marina Resort for our recent short break, neither my husband or I had ever been to Nelson Bay before and the staff made us feel very welcome and were helpful in advising us about things to do. The staff of the Ketch restaurant are to be congratulated on their excellent food and service. Week-end of 3/4 & 5th June , celebrating the start of the whale watching season, with its party atmosphere made our time there very enjoyable as there was so much to do in so little time. We enjoyed the dolphin cruise very much, however I think next time I'd like to go whale-watching. This was a surprise birthday treat for my husband and he thoroughly enjoyed the whole experience. We'll definately make a return visit.
reviews.title: Thoroughly enjoyed the whole experience

aka: Port Stephens Marina Hotel Nelson Bay
description: Marina Resort is a great place to stay while you explore Port Stephens. Marina Resort is well located in the heart of beautiful Port Stephens overlooking Nelson Bay Marina. A short 5m walk to the Dolphin & Whale Watch Cruises in the Marina, Cafes & Beach. Marina Resort is conveniently located near all of Port Stephens major tourist attractions. Our recently refurbished 44 room hotel offer spacious comfort with great views of the bay.
